about_the_game:
Step into the immersive world of Glix, a captivating 2.5D puzzle platformer set in a chilling dystopian future. Take control of a child who wants to uncover the secrets of the surroundings. Navigate through mysterious environments to solve the puzzles and overcome platform challenges, all while immersed in an atmosphere with tension.



Explore bizarre landscapes, witness surreal events, and encounter captivating character designs along the way. But beware, for the truth lies hidden beneath the surface, waiting to be unveiled. Dare to delve deeper into the enigmatic story, unlocking its mysteries one gummy candy at a time. Enter the world of Glix and embark on an unforgettable journey of discovery.

FEATURES




Story
A biotech company runs an odd campaign through the world and changes everything. Embark on a journey navigating the fine line between imagination and reality.

Cinematic Atmosphere
Immerse yourself in a mysterious, cinematic world where the story unfolds through environmental storytelling.

Puzzles
Engage in solving puzzles through interactive environments and overcoming platform obstacles, all while embracing elements of stealth and curiosity.

Sound
Experience enhanced tension with realistic and atmospheric sound design, elevating the immersive atmospheric experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: A lonely boy, lost and pursued, is dragged into a corrupted world. Immerse yourself in the dark dystopian world of "glix" with its atmospheric art style and compelling story. Navigate surreal landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover hidden truths.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Russian, Swedish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
